skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.UndoEvacuate
skill.description: To lift the evacuation of a population from a populated area.

parameter.name: populatedAreas
parameter.description: The ordered list of populated areas from which the populated will be no more evacuated.

link.name: reach
link.description: To move to the populated areas.

link.name: undoEvacuate
link.description: To lift the evacuation of a population.

feedback.name: undoEvacuated
feedback.description: Sent when a population is no more evacuated from a populated area.

argument.name: populatedArea
argument.description: The populated area from which the population is no more evacuated.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "populatedAreas" have been visited. Even if one of them haven't be healed.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "populatedAreas" is empty (no element to act on).
